name: Heavy-Duty Hammer
description: A robust hammer designed for heavy-duty construction tasks, featuring a steel handle for durability and a textured grip for comfort.
usage_tips: Use proper safety goggles and gloves when operating.
Inspect handle regularly for signs of wear or damage.
Store in a dry place to prevent rust.

name: Industrial Power Generator
description: A high-capacity generator built for industrial use, featuring a diesel engine for reliable power output and multiple outlets for various tools.
usage_tips: Regularly check oil and fuel levels before operation.
Ensure proper ventilation when running indoors.
Follow manufacturer's guidelines for maintenance schedules.

name: Cordless Drill
description: A versatile cordless drill suitable for various construction and DIY projects, featuring variable speed control and a keyless chuck.
usage_tips: Charge the battery fully before use.
Use appropriate drill bits for the material.
Avoid overloading to prevent motor burnout.

name: Electric Sander
description: An efficient electric sander perfect for smoothing wood surfaces, featuring variable speed control and a dust collection system.
usage_tips: Wear a dust mask to avoid inhaling particles.
Use the correct grit sandpaper for the task.

name: Laser Level
description: A high-accuracy laser level for ensuring precise alignment in construction projects, featuring self-leveling and multiple mounting options.
usage_tips: Ensure the surface is stable before use.
Use in conjunction with a tripod for best results.
Store in a protective case to prevent damage.

name: Multi-Tool
description: A compact and versatile multi-tool equipped with various attachments for cutting, screwing, and other tasks, featuring a foldable design for portability.
usage_tips: Keep blades and attachments clean and dry.
Use the appropriate attachment for each task.
Regularly check for loose parts and tighten if necessary.
